Wiki Tasks

This page lists task needing completion around Lurker. If you're looking to contribute but don't know where to start, check out the list below!

Editorial

High Priority

  • Create pages for DAW specific stock plugins (eq, compressor, fx, etc).
  • Write descriptions for stock plugins, like Ableton Compressor.

Medium Priority

  • Update DAW descriptions and landing page content. Such as Reason.

Low Priority

  • Write guides for music production in specific DAWs in guides namespace, like Ableton Guides.

Future Plans & Ideas

  • Full wiki translation, starting with Spanish, French, and Korean.

Administrative
